title: Maximum Subarray
description: Given an integer array nums, find the contiguous subarray (containing at least one number) which has the largest sum and return its sum.
inputSpec: First line contains an integer n (1 ≤ n ≤ 10^5). Second line contains n integers nums[i] (-10^4 ≤ nums[i] ≤ 10^4).
outputSpec: An integer representing the maximum sum of the contiguous subarray.
notes: The subarray [4,-1,2,1] has the largest sum = 6.
